alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:06AM CST until January 26 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco near Rosepine. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural and forested areas near the bayou will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.6 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 4.1 Wed 8 am CST 16.5 16.8 11.3 &&
